citation: Proclamation under the Workplaces (Protection from Protesters) Act 2014 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Workplaces (Protection from Protesters) Act 2014

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Workplaces (Protection from Protesters) Act 2014 fix 24 December 2014 as the day on which the provisions of that Act commence.

22 December 2014

C. WARNER

Governor

By Her Excellency's Command,

JEREMY ROCKLIFF

Acting for and on Behalf of the Treasurer

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 24 December 2014

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Justice.
